mapper.select: SELECT * FROM core3 WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='챌린저' ORDER BY core3_count DESC

SELECT * FROM counter WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='그랜드마스터' HAVING counter_win_rate != 100 AND counter_win_rate != 0 AND counter_win_rate >= 50 ORDER BY counter_win_rate DESC

SELECT * FROM counter WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='그랜드마스터' HAVING counter_win_rate != 100 AND counter_win_rate != 0 AND counter_win_rate < 50 ORDER BY counter_win_rate
select championName,championName_kr from champList where line like #{line} order by championName_kr
SELECT championName, championName_kr, highest_pick_rate_position, winrate, pickrate, banrate from champList_emerald where line like #{line} ORDER BY winrate DESC
